description:
The World Duel Carnival kicks off when Yuma is challenged by Striker, a soccer player turned duelist who has one goal in mind – scoring a victory!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: WDC Kicks Off! The Burning Striker - Kakeru Kunitachi
WDCキックオフ! 炎のストライカー・国立(くにたち)カケル
World Duel Carnival Kick Off! Honoo no Striker Kunitachi Kakeru
